name: $number
desc: Search parameter is on a date/time. The date format is the standard XML format, though other formats may be supported.

name: $date
desc: Search parameter is a simple string, like a name part. Search is case-insensitive and accent-insensitive. May match just the start of a string. String parameters may contain spaces.

name: $string
desc: Search parameter on a coded element or identifier. May be used to search through the text, displayname, code and code/codesystem (for codes) and label, system and key (for identifier). Its value is either a string or a pair of namespace and value, separated by a "|", depending on the modifier used.

name: $reference
desc: A composite search parameter that combines a search on two values together.

name: $composite
desc: A search parameter that searches on a quantity.

name: $quantity
desc: A search parameter that searches on a URI (RFC 3986).
